ingredients.description: dried coconut pulp, sugar, glucose syrup (corn, wheat), emulsifier (mono- and diglycerides of fatty acids), moisture-retaining agent (glycerin), flavoring (vanillin), salt; milk chocolate (total cocoa solids – at least 27%, skimmed cocoa solids – at least 4.5%, dry milk residue – at least 20%, milk fat – at least 3.5%): sugar, cocoa butter, cocoa mass, lactose, whole milk powder, whey powder, milk fat, emulsifier (soy lecithin), flavoring (vanillin) Transisomers of unsaturated fatty acids in chocolate – no more than 1%.
ingredients.storage: store at a temperature from 15 ° C to 22 ° C and a relative humidity of no more than 65%.
